channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Texas A&M University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: A Pairwise Pseudo-likelihood Approach for Matrix Completion with Informative Missingness
item.description: New method recovers low-rank matrices with informative missingness, offering robust, near-optimal performance.

item.title: Communication-Efficient Federated Group Distributionally Robust Optimization
item.description: Communication-efficient algorithms for federated group distributionally robust optimization (FGDRO) are introduced, achieving lower communication complexity and superior performance on real-world task…

item.title: Equivariant Blurring Diffusion for Hierarchical Molecular Conformer Generation
item.description: Equivariant Blurring Diffusion (EBD) generates 3D molecular conformers hierarchically, first creating coarse-grained fragments then refining atomic details, significantly outperforming existing method…

item.title: Gradient Rewiring for Editable Graph Neural Network Training
item.description: Gradient Rewiring (GRE) improves editable GNN training by addressing gradient inconsistencies, preserving training node performance while correcting target node errors.
